[Olivung's Cook Like a Chef]: Grilled Pigling Meat


[Ingredients]
4 cuts of Pigling Meat
3 Sky Lotus
Half a Flame Pepper
1 cup of Sky Lotus Drink
1/6 of White Hart horn
Water from the Lake of Tears
A pinch of Herb-Seasoned Salt


**Use more Flame Pepper if you want the dish to be spicy.

**Searing Fangspawn's Flame will give you the ideal temperature to cook. Next page.

{recipe}

1. Boil the White Hart horn and Pigling Meat in the Lake of Tears water, and allow it to steep for 3 days.

2. When the outside becomes transparent and white, season it with Herb-Seasoned Salt.

4. Saute the Flame Pepper and Sky Lotus in butter, being careful not to burn the ingredients.

5. Deglaze the pan using Sky Lotus Drink to add a soft and fresh taste.

6. When the ingredients are grilled just right, serve them on a dish.Next page.

A secret tip to all the readers!

**Tie up the Pigling Meat with Ovoliths's Web to give the meat a nice shape and ensure even cooking. The best Ovoliths's Web comes from the Island of Dawn.


**Save the water left after boiling the White Hart horn! The water can be used to add flavor to any dish!Stop reading.
